meanings.sent1: The sheriff will deputize a new officer to help keep the town safe.
meanings.sent2: The manager decided to deputize Sarah to assist with the project.
meanings.sent3: In a funny twist, the cat tried to deputize the dog to catch the mice.
meanings.sent4: The teacher deputized the student as the class monitor for the day.
meanings.sent5: The superhero deputized a group of kids to help save the city from the alien invasion.

meanings.sent1: During the sheriff's absence, Sarah will deputize and oversee the town's safety.
meanings.sent2: The officer had to deputize for her colleague who was on sick leave.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to deputize for the dog and guard the house from intruders.
meanings.sent4: The substitute teacher deputized for the regular teacher and managed the class well.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight deputized for the king and led the army into battle.
